Title: Relates to racing support payments for certain gaming facility licensees
Summary: Requires certain gaming facility licensees to make racing support payments to licensed racetracks in their region and the NYS horse breeding development fund and NYS thoroughbred breeding and development fund.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to racing support payments
